duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide quality, clinical supervision and work directions to program managers and interventionists.
Conduct behavior assessments and functions as an Assessor when needed.
Facilitate behavior programs based on the principles of Applied Behavior Analysis (ABA).
Lead, attend meetings and conduct on-going staff trainings.
Function as a liaison between the organization, families, community, therapists, health care providers, etc.

education_certification.credential: Master's degree from an accredited college or university with a concentration in early childhood education/development, early childhood special education, special education, psychology or related field.
